source_name: Prestige Class: Sacred Knight (Eldritch Knight Archetype)

sections.title: Sacred Knight (Eldritch Knight Archetype) (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Sacred Knight (Eldritch Knight Archetype) class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Religious Training (Sacred Knight (Eldritch Knight Archetype))
sections.description: Adds sacred knight levels to fighter and divine spellcasting class levels for the purpose of meeting feat prerequisites. Treats eldritch knight levels as fighter levels if the character has no actual fighter levels.

sections.title: Spells per Day (Sacred Knight (Eldritch Knight Archetype))
sections.description: Advances divine spellcasting progression at indicated levels, granting spells per day, spells known, and increased caster level. Must choose which divine class to advance if multiclassed.

sections.title: Holy Critical (Su) (Sacred Knight (Eldritch Knight Archetype))
sections.description: On confirmed critical hits, can deliver blessing, domain power, revelation, shaman hex, or spirit power through weapon without provoking attacks of opportunity. Replaces spell critical ability.
